en: What are the primary parts of the Funded Proposer lifecycle?
sw: Je, ni sehemu gani za msingi za mzunguko wa Mpendekeza Aliyefadhiliwa?

en: What kinds of work and activities will happen at the new Blockchain Lab?
sw: Ni aina gani za kazi na shughuli zitafanyika katika Maabara mpya ya Blockchain?

en: When Assessors reads a proposal, what three facets are they evaluating?
sw: Wakati Watathmini wanasoma pendekezo, ni mambo gani matatu wanayotathmini?

en: What should you do if there is no Campaign that is a good fit for the type of work you would like to Propose?
sw: Je, unapaswa kufanya nini ikiwa hakuna Kampeni ambayo inafaa kwa aina ya kazi ambayo ungependa Kupendekeza?

en: Which of the following is NOT a reason to keep your ada in a self-custodial wallet, rather than on an exchange?
sw: Ni ipi kati ya zifuatazo SI sababu ya kuweka ada yako katika pochi lako, badala ya ubadilishanaji?

en: Which of the following is NOT a way to earn ada as a participant in Project Catalyst?
sw: Ni ipi kati ya zifuatazo SI njia ya kupata ada kama mshiriki katika project catalyst

en: What is the name of the community-defined categories that present and define challenges in the Cardano ecosystem?
sw: Je, ni jina gani la kategoria zilizoainishwa na jamii zinazowasilisha na kufafanua changamoto katika mfumo wa ikolojia ya Cardano?

en: What are three advantages of smart contracts?
sw: Je! ni faida gani tatu za mikataba ya bora (smart contract)

en: What is a recommended approach to marketing your project?
sw: Je, ni mbinu gani inayopendekezwa ya kutangaza/ kuuza mradi wako?

en: Why did Lido Nation choose Cardano as our main blockchain?
sw: Kwa nini Lido Nation ilichagua Cardano kama blockchain yetu kuu?

sw: Kwa nini ni wazo zuri kuwasilisha mapendekezo mapema katika awamu ya project catalyst?

en: Which is true about funding for winning proposals?
sw: Je, ni nini kweli kuhusu ufadhili wa mapendekezo ya yaliyoshinda?

en: How does DirectEd hope their blockchain solution will attract charitable donations?
sw: Je, DirectEd inatumai kuwa suluhisho lao la blockchain litavutia michango ya hisani kivipi?

en: What is true about voting in Project Catalyst?
sw: Je, ni nini kweli kuhusu upigaji kura katika Project Catalyst?

en: What does receiving the Cardano Foundation delegation mean?
sw: Je, kupokea uwakilishi wa Cardano Foundation kunamaanisha nini?

en: What reasons are postulated for why Africans might readily adopt Web3 technology?
sw: Ni sababu zipi zimetolewa kwa nini Waafrika wanaweza kukumbatia teknolojia ya Web3 kwa urahisi?

en: What is true about crypto wallets?
sw: Je, ni nini kweli kuhusu pochi za crypto?

en: Why is this news exciting?
sw: Kwa nini habari hii inasisimua?

sw: Je, ni nini kweli kuhusu upigaji kura katika Project Catalyst?

en: What is the baseline function of a staking pool?
sw: Je, kazi ya msingi ya hifadhi ya hisa ni nini?

en: What role do auditors play in Project Catalyst, as described in this article?
sw: Je, wakaguzi wana jukumu gani katika Project Catalyst, kama ilivyoelezwa katika makala haya?

en: What examples exemplify first, second, and third generation blockchains?
sw: Ni mifano gani inayotoa mfano wa blockchain ya kizazi cha kwanza, cha pili, na cha tatu?

en: What did JCrypto and his friend do with their eel catches from their beat-up fishing boat?
sw: Je, JCrypto na rafiki yake walifanya nini na samaki wao wa aina ya eel kutoka kwenye mashua yao zee ya uvuvi?

en: What does Tyler Rodrigues do for a living?
sw: Je, Tyler Rodrigues anafanya kazi gani?

sw: Gani SIO faida ya DApps kwenye Cardano?

sw: Ni ipi kati ya zifuatazo SI mfano wa ulimwengu halisi wa matumizi ya blockchain?

en: What feature of blockchain technology underpins the types of applications it works well for?
sw: Je, ni kipengele gani cha teknolojia ya blockchain kinachosisitiza aina za programu ambazo hufanya kazi vizuri?

sw: Ni ipi kati ya zifuatazo SI faida iliyo katika DApps?

en: What is a DAO?
sw: DAO ni nini?

en: Should companies today be building DApps instead of Apps?
sw: Je, makampuni leo yanapaswa kujenga DApps badala ya Programu za kawaida?

sw: Ni ipi sio nguzo ya muundo na maadili ya Cardano?

sw: Je, "kutoaminika" inamaanisha nini katika blockchain?

en: Which of these is not a real-world example of a DApp?:
sw: Ni ipi kati ya hizi sio mfano wa ulimwengu halisi wa DApp?:

sw: Ni ipi iliyo kweli kuhusu Ugatuaji kwenye Cardano?

en: Which is an advantage of a DEX?
sw: Je, ni gani faida ya DEX?

en: Which of the following is not a benefit of DeFi?
sw: Ni ipi kati ya zifuatazo ambayo sio faida ya DeFi?

en: How do DAOs change things?
sw: Je, DAO hubadilisha mambo vipi?

en: How can the blockchain be used to combat fraudulent odometer readings in the automotive industry?
sw: Je, blockchain inawezaje kutumika kupambana na usomaji wa ulaghai wa maili ya gari katika tasnia ya magari?

en: In our section on Ben Grimes, we concluded that blockchain
sw: Katika sehemu yetu ya Ben Grimes, tulihitimisha kuwa blockchain

en: What are some potential uses for blockchain technology beyond cryptocurrency?
sw: Je, ni matumizi gani yanayoweza kutumika kwa teknolojia ya blockchain zaidi ya cryptocurrency?

en: How might linking a private blockchain to a public one potentially mitigate the risks of transparency for companies?
sw: Je, kuunganisha blockchain ya kibinafsi na ya umma kunawezaje kupunguza hatari za uwazi kwa kampuni?

en: What are some ways that respect and communication contribute to collective success in a mentorship relationship?
sw: Je, ni baadhi ya njia zipi ambazo heshima na mawasiliano huchangia katika mafanikio ya pamoja katika uhusiano wa ushauri?

en: What does the "pillar" of Sustainability mean to Cardano?
sw: Je, "nguzo" ya Uendelevu ina maana gani kwa Cardano?
